short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reroutes all web requests ending with .p2p to your p2p.Ninja Gateway

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is intended to be used by people running a p2p.Ninja node on their local network using a Raspberry Pi. With this extension installed, all web requests that end with '.p2p' will be intercepted and rerouted to your local network p2p.Ninja node. This allows you to create and browse a true peer to peer network in your neighborhood.
